did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Research materials, manuscripts, and galley proofs.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Material used by Herbert Croly in writing his biography of Willard Straight.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Material used by Herbert Croly in writing his biography of Willard Straight. Includes transcriptions of Straight's diaries and correspondence, drafts of chapters, galley proofs, and lists of people consulted for memoirs and sent copies of the biography. The biography, entitled WILLARD STRAIGHT, was written between 1922 and 1924 (published in 1924).

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Herbert David Croly. Papers, #3922. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

unittitle.extref: Link to a partial finding aid.

scopecontent.p: All the material in the collection may not be covered by this guide.
